ggplot(sum_comp_data, aes(x = X_Distance, y = Y_Distance, fill = Quarter_Heading_Diff)) +
  geom_tile()+
  xlim(-2,2) +
  ylim(0,2) +
  facet_wrap(~ Flow + Ablation + Darkness) +
  scale_fill_viridis() +
  theme_light()
